oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Greene, Duke - Letter
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greene, Colton; Civil War; correspondence;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: B. W. Duke, Attorney, Louisville, KY, to General Colton Greene: discusses publication of article written by Hines and Castleman about "the North Western Conspiracy", a war-time effort to free Confederate prisoners; relates that the authors wish to vindicate northern participants who were motivated not by southern sympathy but by abrogation of their own rights; reveals that Hines is ill and wishes to publish article before it is too late, preferably in the "Bivouac"; asks that Greene preserve letter and show it to Mr. Black.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
